review: This is a great product, and works as advertised. With our Prime membership it has vastly opened up the amount of free movies/tv available. We've been satellite/cable bill free for many years now, and this combined with Netflix will be sure to keep it that way.My only complaint: We purchased this on Jan 11 for $99, only to see it listed on Jan 25 for $84. C'mon Amazon -- how about offering loyal customers the same 30 day price guarantee that many other manufacturers selling on Amazon offer for their products? If you don't, the $15 dollars isn't going to make or brake me; but I will remember this the next time I'm looking at Amazon hardware, and be less likely to buy until I'm absolutely sure the price being offered is at bottom. Hardly a recipe for increasing your sales, or your customers' willingness to take a chance on your newest hardware offering.

author: J. Miller

review: It does work, it just didn't work that well for me.  I received it as a Christmas gift and it got stuck in a loop trying to update the software and wanting me to register.  I am guessing it was auto-registered to my nephew (who got it for me) and me putting in my info gave it heartburn.I had to get amazon support on the phone and they opened a ticket.  I tried power off/on each day for 2 days, then it was finally resolved (no email or phone call back to me however).The Netflix app seems to have the most problems.  It would get stuck loading at 25% so I'd have to turn it off/on and try again.Lastly, the Wi-Fi isn't the greatest.  It's 10 feet away from my wireless router (in the same room no less) and it still buffers/stutters with showing movies -- again, especially on Netflix.To fix the buffering problem, I got a long network ethernet cable and now, at long last, it is streaming fine -- but now I have a cable going across the room.  Sadness.
author: Ohio Guy "neoguy"

review: The unit works great. We subscribe to both "Prime" and "Netfilx" and it is excellent for both. We used to use a laptop to access "Prime" and "Netflix," and this is a HUGE improvement in convenience and functionality. The remote does not need line of sight" to operate, is easy to operate and has a high quality feel. If you're wondering about the voice recognition, it works and works extremely well. If you're a "Prime" subscriber, we highly recommend Fire TV.
